articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Scientists show off the wide vision of Europe’s Euclid space telescope - Ars Technica
articles.description: The $1.5 billion Euclid telescope will use light to study the dark Universe.
articles.content: Enlarge/ One of the first galaxies that Euclid observed is nicknamed the "Hidden Galaxy." This galaxy, also known as IC 342 or Caldwell 5, is difficult to observe because it lies behind the busy disk… [+3185 chars]

articles.author: Guy Chazan
articles.title: Palestinians flee as Israeli troops battle Hamas in Gaza City - Financial Times
articles.description: G7 foreign ministers call for ‘unimpeded humanitarian support’ for civilians trapped in the besieged Palestinian territory
articles.content:
Thousands of Palestinians fled northern Gaza on foot as Israeli troops battling Hamas militants moved into Gaza City, the main population centre of the beleaguered enclave.
